title: Canker at the core

description: Part 2 of a series on Australian women artists, examining some of their thoughts, struggles, aspirations, influences and disappointments, and the effect of sexual discrimination and stereotyping. Features the following artists: Barbara Hanrahan, Anne Graham, Jacqueline Hick, Elizabeth Durack, Marian Hardman, Elise Bluman, Joan Brassil, Dora Chapman, Sybil Craig, Grace Cossington-Smith. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels and tertiary level.
